dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] legal letter form Kingsoft]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, November 14, 2005 10:32 AM
To: polly.peng@kingsoft.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] legal letter form Kingsoft]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the address
of copyright@theplanet.com.


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] legal letter form Kingsoft
Date: Mon, 14 Nov 2005 17:24:42 +0800
From: polly.peng <polly.peng@kingsoft.com>
To: <adimns@theplanet.com>,        <abuse@theplanet.com>

Dear Sir or Madam:



I am Polly.Peng, the legal counsel of Kingsoft Co., Ltd. (referred to herein as the
